title: Quran Translation English Only by Ibrahim Walk
description:
This is a verse by verse English Only Translation of Quran. The arabic parts have been cut hence the mp3 is cut in so many parts. Just add all the mp3s in your medi player and listen. 


If anyone wants I'll upload the version with Arabic Recitation with English translation as well.


Would like to emphasize that this translation text of the Quran in English is not a substitute for the original Arabic Quran. It is only an attempt to help those who do not understand Arabic, to learn and memorize few verses in English so that they can use it for praying. 


We pray to Almighty Allah (The Lord) to help you understand the meaning of the Holy Quran.


Thank you!
